faq.question: Can I monitor my solar system's performance?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Every system includes real-time monitoring through user-friendly smartphone apps. You can track energy production, consumption, and savings from anywhere. The system alerts you to any issues, and we remotely monitor all Agawam installations to ensure optimal performance. Most homeowners love checking their solar production daily!

faq.question: What happens when my Agawam solar system produces excess energy?
faq.answer: Massachusetts offers excellent net metering policies. When your Agawam solar panels produce more electricity than you consume, the excess flows to the grid and you receive full retail rate credits on your Eversource bill. These credits roll forward month-to-month, allowing summer overproduction to offset winter usage.
